comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: There was a bug wherein Revenant skills/specializations weren’t exposed by the server that reads the dat file. Fixed it Oct. 19th, it should go out sometime this month.

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: I forgot to add it. Sorry, should have it up today.

comments.author: Durzan.4603
comments.body:
Hi,

I work on a little tool and I need all specializations so I thought the API would be perfect but the /specializations endpoint contains every class except the revenant. Am I just blind or did you forget to add it?

I couldn’t find any information about this issue in the forum so that’s the reason that I ask about it.
